pages.title: About me
pages.text: 90’s chinese. Initial member of Onion Math(洋葱数学) team.Now a sub-team leader, Web architect and Node.js service developer. Thinker of computer science. Love to watch movies and play Minecraft. Big fun and document.getElementById('tag-calc-1').innerHTML = eval((new Date()).getFullYear()-2007); years user of Linux OS.

'use strict'; // Replace qrcode URLs to qrcode image data URLs. Array .from(document.querySelectorAll('a.donate > span > img')) .forEach(async imgElement => { const url = imgElement.src; const dataUrl = await QRCode.toDataURL(url); imgElement.src = dataUrl; });
